name: EILF - Six in a Row Pack
detailed_description:
Turn a sequence of six walls or guards into a line of six coins to loot!

Alternate gameplay adds a new game piece when there are six of the same game pieces vertically or horizontally. Clicking on the new game piece will convert the six game pieces into coins. Turn a sequence of six walls or guards (or any other non-coin game pieces) into a line of six coins to loot! Play with strategy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 fullscreen or any resolution windowed
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
